label: dog
caption: A team of six sleek dogs, their fur ruffled by the wind, are in perfect synchrony as they propel a sturdy sled through the snowy terrain. The leader of the pack, its piercing gaze fixed intently ahead, sets the pace for its companions. In the midst of this exhilarating scene, the sound of crunching snow and joyful yips fill the crisp winter air.
